title: Minisode: An Interview with "Legends and Lattes" Author Travis Baldree
itunes:title: Minisode: An Interview with "Legends and Lattes" Author Travis Baldree
description:
Today’s spoiler-free minisode includes a conversation between Meredith and author Travis Baldree. Travis is the author of Legends and Lattes, which has gone gangbusters through the Currently Reading community. Tune into this conversation with Travis to hear about:

  • Emotional support books

  • Cozy Fantasy: a Hallmark-style movie set in Dungeons and Dragons?

  • The journey to publication

  • Favorite characters

  • Cover conversations

  • Fan art

  • The details on his next book

  • The last 5-star book he read!

Minisode show notes are not timestamped, but linked titles are below for you to peruse. These are affiliate links, which kick back a small percentage of your purchase to the podcast, which helps support the show!

Legends and Lattes by Travis Baldree (pre-order at Bookshop, or buy it now at Amazon)

Nettle and Bone by T Kingfisher

Connect with Travis: on Instagram at @travis_baldree, on Facebook, Twitter or at his website

Contact the show at currentlyreadingpodcast@gmail.com.

You can find Meredith on Instagram @meredith.reads and Kaytee @notesonbookmarks

You can visit our website at www.currentlyreadingpodcast.com
